K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-3: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-4: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-5: phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-6: gsang ba rnams su srung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-7: slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser bskon zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240a-8: kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-0: gsad dang mi bden pa @240b dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spangs de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-1: 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-2: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-3: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyod rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-4: rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-5: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-6: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-7: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o; ;dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i padma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-8: dbang po lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni ngor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-9: gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su des so mi bdag kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-10: phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:240b-11: klu rnams kyis sa ma bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-0: sa las byung ba rnams su @241a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-1: rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-2: sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-3: rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-4: ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-5: rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu sbyin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-6: rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-7: rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-8: 'khor lor 'chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-9: gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi padma smad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-10: sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin gyi 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-11: rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal ba grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241a-12: chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs nus ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-0: rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis @241b byams pa sogs su sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-1: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-2: de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-3: dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bkur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-4: phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-5: shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-6: 'gro ba g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-7: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-8: gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-9: gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-10: rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-11: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:241b-12: de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-0: byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te @242a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-1: gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-2: grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-3: phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dgu pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-4: sgyu yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-5: dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur ro dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-6: bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-7: phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-8: de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g-yo ba la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-9: nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung bo lha min rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-10: dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-11: gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-12: ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242a-13: mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-0: rgyal ba dbang por @242b byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-1: rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-2: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-3: slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-4: phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin par byas nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-5: skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g-yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-6: khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-7: de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de bla mas spang bya mi'i dpang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-8: sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-10: yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-11: aodda dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:242b-12: snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye pa la sogs pa yis de ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-0: dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas @243a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-1: pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-2: phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-3: 'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni padmar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-4: aodda rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-5: 'dod dang dga' dang g-yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-6: gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-7: 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-8: aodda dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-9: sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste rig par bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-10: rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-11: thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-12: de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-13: chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243a-14: de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-0: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du @243b bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-1: phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-2: rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-3: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-5: gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smras pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-7: de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-8: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-9: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-10: shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-11: de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-12: gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-13: las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g-yang byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-14: yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-15: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:243b-16: lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-1: kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-2: ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-3: ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-4: chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor ba rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-5: shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-6: dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-7: de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-8: des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-9: nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-10: stong pa las ni du pa smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-11: 'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244a-12: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-0: chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse @244b gcig gnas pa'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-1: ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-2: der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-3: yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-4: sku mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-5: brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-6: ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-7: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-8: mtha' dag 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-9: gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-10: de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-11: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:244b-12: sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-0: me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung @245a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-1: gi gzugs su snang yang g-yo ba med pas rlung ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-2: stong ba'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-3: rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-4: sgra tsam thig la cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-5: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje padmar bcas dang padma rdo rje ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-6: dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can med par 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-7: du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-8: dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa gams dang g-yon pa bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-9: phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-10: bde ba dam pa'i don du padmar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-11: sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-12: sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245a-13: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-0: rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa @245b gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-1: mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-2: 'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-3: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te aoddam las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-4: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-5: gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-6: g-yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-7: gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te turya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-8: yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-9: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-10: sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu rya'i rang bzhin rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:245b-11: lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa; ;ye shes gnas kyang bud mad dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-0: sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu @246a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-2: de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-3: khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-4: rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-5: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-6: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang gi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-7: rgya gar gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sa manta shr'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-007:246a-8: lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
